message.name: ERR_XRV_EFFECTIVEDATE_PRIOR_TO_EXPIRYDATE
message.locale: Effective Date Time should be prior to the Expiry Date Time.

message.name: ERR_XRV_EFFECTIVEDATE_AND_EXPIRYDATE_CANNOT_BE_THE_SAME
message.locale: Effective Date Time and Expiry Date Time cannot be the same.

message.name: ERR_XRV_EFFECTIVEDATE_CANNOT_BE_PRIOR_TO_CURRENTDATE
message.locale: Effective Date Time must not be before the Current Date Time.

message.name: ERR_XRV_TITLE_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Title is too long. Please reduce the length of this Title.

message.name: ERR_XRV_MESSAGE_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Message is too long. Please reduce the length of this Message.
